description: Identifier/name for the organizational account or location within the fleet; used to associate assets, work, and costs to that unit.
Human-readable description of the account, providing additional context beyond the identifier (purpose, location, or department details).
Date the account becomes active or valid for use in transactions and reporting.
Date to begin warning that the account will expire soon; used to trigger notifications or reporting flags.
Date the account expires and becomes invalid for transactions or selection.
Indicator that the account is temporarily inactive/absent from normal operations or selection lists; likely a Y/N flag; confirm with SME.
Code representing the reporting or security group this account belongs to, supporting hierarchy or access control.
Numeric order or key used to sort or link accounts within a group; supports hierarchical grouping or display order.
Username or system ID that created the record (audit trail).
Timestamp when the record was created (audit trail).
Username or system ID that last modified the record (audit trail).
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record (audit trail).
Optional list or pattern of activity codes allowed or included for this account in billing, work orders, or reporting; behavior may vary; confirm with SME.
User-defined text field for custom notes, tags, or integration-specific values related to the account.
